unnormalised: Loved reading about PT Usha! Inspired me since school, remember watching "Chak De! India" back then. Makes you feel you can run like crazy too! What an athlete. Her struggles from Payyoli are something else. Truly amazing. More stories from Indian athletes, please! Maybe one on Milkha Singh next? Or Sunil Chhetri? Jai Hind!
normalised: Loved reading about P T Usha! Inspired me since school, remember watching "Chak De! India" back then. Makes you feel you can run like crazy too! What an athlete. Her struggles from Payyoli are something else. Truly amazing. More stories from Indian athletes, please! Maybe one on Milkha Singh next? Or Sunil Chhetri? Jai Hind!
